source_sentence: 摩訶拘嚕(二合)馱薩怛嚩(二合無保反)唅　發言身即同　　降三世金剛　四印加寶灌　　鬘甲二擬繫　拍掌同金剛　　即入三摩地　諦觀心阿字　　成月或日輪　中生五智杵　　次請尊及佛　入加三昧身　　又以本教中　四印加已滿　　五寶鬘甲拍　陳內外供養　　讚詠已念誦　若作圓具法　　以五相成身　又普悅本誓　　忿四印五佛　寶鬘甲拍等　　以吽迦囉印　加心誦真言吽薩怛嚩(二合)襪日哩(二合)惹嚩(二合)羅麼羅拘嚕(二合)馱吽發吒(半聲)阿地底瑟咤(二合)娑嚩(二合)[牟*含]　次寶二風寶(餘准此)　法以火如蓮　　業建火逼風　額喉頂四印　　五佛大日用　真實教王中　　金剛界自在　誦此祕密言唵嚩日囉(二合)惹嚩(二合)攞鉢囉(二合)跛多(二合)羯灑也薩嚩怛他蘖多摩賀嚩日囉(二合)三麼耶吽　四佛同四印　　金剛佛真言吽薩怛嚩(二合)襪日哩(二合)惹嚩(二合)邏末羅拘嚕(二合)馱吽(引)發吒(半音)阿鼻詵(去)左[牟*含]　寶用金剛寶(餘三准此)　　鬘甲印准前鬘真言曰。
translation: After praising and chanting, if he creates a complete set of precepts, then he'll make offerings inside and out, recite them after praising the body, and then universally please the body with the original vow, the four seals of wrath, the five buddhas, the precious garland, the beat, and so forth. With the ungulate seal, he adds his mind to the recitation of the true and real teaching king, recites the esoteric words, "Un satanta, sowṛ(b), jagatha(b), lākbala(b), mātṛkadhātu(b)," and "unfaithful" (half-voice), "Adiṣṭiṣṭha(b)," [mu*ham], "The next treasure, the two wind treasures," and "The rest are congruent with this.

source_sentence: 唵襪日囉(二合)莽[口*(隸-木+士)]儞哩(二合)茶(去)被甲誦此明。
translation: "Om soxhiluo(er) mang[kou*(l-mo+sh)]nyeri(er) cha(go)," and he recites this luminous statement.

source_sentence: 唵襪日囉(二合)[口*洛]乞叉(三合)儞哩(二合)茶(去)　四攝八供養　　同金剛界儀　唯現於擬叱鉤真言曰。
translation: "Om soxhiluo[mou*lo]kikṣa(triad) nirī(diad) cha(go), the four collections and eight offerings are the same as the rituals of the vajradhātu, but they are only manifested in the true words of the proposed rebuke," he said.

source_sentence: 唵襪日[口*朗](二合)句捨麼賀句嚕(二合)馱羯灑耶沙(去)莽鹽(引)吽惹(入)索真言曰。
translation: "Om soxhay [mou*rang] (btn) kuśa mahoraga (btn) dhakrasa (depart) mangan (cite) unja (enter) so," he said.

source_sentence: 唵襪日囉(二合)跛捨麼賀句嚕(二合)馱羯灑耶娑(去)莽鹽吽吽鎖真言曰。
translation: "Om soxhiluo (er) limosha mahoraga khadaka sahas (departed) manganian.

source_sentence: 唵襪日囉(二合)寒普(二合)吒麼賀句嚕(二合)馱羯灑耶娑(去)莽鹽鑁鈴真言。
translation: "Om soxhilā (btn) hampu (btn) za mahoraga gurulu (btn) dhaddharma saraya sah (depart) mangan yam and baṭhala true chant.

source_sentence: 唵襪日囉(二合)吠捨麼賀句嚕(二合)馱羯灑耶娑(去)莾鹽斛嬉戲真言曰。
translation: "The mantra of Om Soxhila (er) Vaiśeṣya Māhajoglu (er) Dhavajāsāya Sa (go) Goose Yama and play with the salt," he said.

source_sentence: 唵襪日囉(二合)攞細麼賀句嚕(二合)馱羯灑耶娑(去)莽鹽斛　又前觀智身　　自心流婀字　面前成月輪　　即出生金剛　五峯流猛焰　　生三悅我是　又丈於世尊　　即召滿空佛　入金剛鎖悅　　又稱明顯言　金剛即變成　　吽迦囉金剛　暴怒處月輪　　身流火光聚　遍體玄青色　　大自在天王　妃烏摩為座　　歷然分明見　即四印加持　　又示羯摩印　滿月已五灌　　寶鬘甲拍等　施內外供養　　自住薩埵身　扭擲金剛杵　　震動大千界　誦百八名讚　　都請諸聖賢　鉤召索引入　　鎖止鈴悅喜　四明召智身　　入自體無二　又四加示誓　　滿月已五灌　寶鬘甲拍已　　又陳內外供　即起平身立　　舉右足左旋　攝彼傲慢者　　大自在欲王　撲至於地已　　定按於彼頂　慧踐彼王妃　　烏摩乳房上　摧彼我慢故　　以足加於頂　被害殞此已　　灰嚴界成佛　住是三昧時　　極力頻身蹋　或身掉出污　　當知尊攝受　定慧金剛拳　　二地結風背　循身觀相好　　歷然見如前　旋時誦足鉤真言曰。
translation: "Om soxhila(er) laśeemo hejoglu(er) dhakrāsaya sah(go) māyāntika Also, when he first contemplates the body of wisdom, his own mind flows gracefully, his face becomes a moon, and he gives rise to the vajra, five peaks flowing with fierce flame, and the three pleasures of self arise, and he also abides in the Bhagavān, summoning the Pūrṇa Maitrāyaniputra to enter the vajra lock and joy. He also praises the Bhagavān, summons the index to enter his own body without duality, and he makes four vows, showing that the vajra is transformed into the Unkarasvara, the vajra in the raging place, the body flowing with fire, the body being a cluster of rays, and the entire body being a deep blue color.

source_sentence: 唵(引)迦(引)那(引)羯哩灑(二合)庾嚩日囉(二合)吽(短)步蹋時真言曰。
translation: "Om (cited) ka (cited) na (cited) karṣa (dichotomy) yu vajra (dichotomy) un (short) step when stepping out," he says.

source_sentence: 唵(引)嚩日囉(二合引)麼(半)吽(短)　又見自心月　　金剛具五峯　中有所持明　　流射金剛火　住是大三昧　　持根本真言　或心一字明　　或業心中心　擿枳王真言　　住定疲極已　方坐誦讚歎　　陳供及發願　即作解脫法　　以本法四印　四處掣開之心上真言曰。
translation: "When he sees the moon in his own mind, the vajra with its five peaks, the brightness he holds in his center, the brightness he radiates from the vajra fire, the great concentration he maintains, the fundamental dhāraṇī, the one-word dhāraṇī of his mind, the mental center of his karma, the true dhāraṇī of the Śākyamuni king, and the method of liberation he creates by reciting praises, making offerings, and making vows with the four seals of the original Dharma, which are unlocked in four places, he says.

source_sentence: 唵(引)薩怛嚩(二合)嚩日囉(二合)惹嚩(二合)羅麼(引)羅矩嚕(二合引)馱吽(短)發吒(半音)目　又以真實王　　四印掣開之心上真言曰。
translation: "Om (citation) satatana (binary) vajra (binary) jagatana (binary) lakumā (binary) lakumā (binary) daṇḍa (short) fakṣa (half-sound) mūla And using the four seals of the true, real king, he switches them on mentally with the following dhāraṇī.

source_sentence: 唵(引)薩怛嚩(二合)嚩日哩(二合)吽(短)　聖眾還宮已　　即寶鬘甲拍　護此常恒身　　四禮五向等　餘皆同諸教　　降三世瑜伽　二羽印當心　　慧手持五鈷　努臂如下擬　　次箭劍直執　定上五鈷鉤　　次弓次執索　皆直引臂持　　四面正青色　右黃左綠色　　後紅咸忿怒　自在天王妃　　為座如前說　吽迦囉金剛　　作如是相好金剛瑜伽降三世成就極深密門一卷
translation: "Om (citation needed) satanta-va (er) vajri (er) un (short) After the sages returned to the palace, they then placed the jeweled garland on their arm to protect their eternal bodies, paid homage to the five directions, and so forth. The rest are the same as the teachings. The yoga of subduing the three worlds, the two-feather seal over the heart, the five coins held in the hand of wisdom, the five coins held in the lower arm, the arrow and sword held directly, the five coins hooked in the upper arm of meditation, the bow held in the next arm, and the rope held in the next arm, all held directly in the arm. The four faces are correctly blue, the right yellow, the left green, and the last red and wrathful.
